thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: B.D

author: B.D
title: B.D
text: Been using Banggood now for over a year and simply can't fault them. Great range of products, especially the RC and Electronics department I mainly use. Every delivery has reached me in the U.K in good condition, normally in around 2 -2.5 weeks. I've had one item defective and after sending through a video of the defect they simply sent out a replacement product. Nothing but positives from my shopping experiences.
